TEXT: Fading dust catches the faint gleam, as countless names freeze into stillness—— NL ——She is not only a「Heroine」, but also the「King of Sarkaz」

On a dimly lit street, you meet several Vampire wearing hoods performing some kind of ritual. They are in total shock and fear due to your unexpected appearance. NL Military Commission need the attendance of the Vampire. And it may be a chance for you to ask for their assistance before you summon the Duq'arael
